props.activeClass: The class applied to a [v-btn](/components/buttons) when activated.
props.backgroundColor: Changes the background-color for the component.
props.dark: Applies the dark theme variant to the component. You can find more information on the Material Design documentation for [dark themes](https://material.io/design/color/dark-theme.html).
props.grow: Force [v-btn](/components/buttons)s to take up all available space.
props.hideOnScroll: Will transition the navigation off screen when scrolling up.
props.horizontal: Uses an alternative horizontal styling for [v-btn](/components/buttons).
props.inputValue: Controls whether the component is visible or hidden. Supports the **.sync** modifier.
props.light: Applies the light theme variant to the component.
props.mandatory: Forces a value to always be selected (if available).
props.shift: Hides text of [v-btn](/components/buttons)s when they are not active.
props.value: Holds the value of the currently active [v-btn](/components/buttons). If the button has no value supplied, its index will be used instead..

events.change: The value of currently selected button. If no value is assigned, will be the current index of the button.
